level.text: 2319.1 A licensee shall retain records of appraisal, analysis, and reviewssignments, including oral testimony, in the following manner:
For a period of at least five (5) years after preparation of the reportenerated by the activity; or

If a report was the subject of or used for litigation purposes, andestimony was given, the report shall be kept for two (2) years after finalisposition of any judicial proceeding in which testimony was given.
2319.2 A licensee shall, upon demand or request by the Board, promptly produceny document, book, or record concerning any appraisal that the licensee orertificate holder performed.
